---
title: "Why clinicians should consider the role of culture in chronic pain"
subtitle: 'Brazilian Journal of Physical Therapy'
date: 2018-09-01
abstract: |
  Chronic pain is one of the most common and costly health conditions worldwide. A single solution to this problem has not yet been identified, perhaps due to the complex ways that biological, psychological, and social factors interact to contribute to and maintain this problem. Culture is one such factor.
